verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6213>Make<s%> you <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver;<s%> of a <S%H4749>whole<s%> piece shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> them: that you may use them for the <S%H4744>calling<s%> of the <S%H5712>assembly,<s%> and for the <S%H4550>journeying<s%> of the <S%H4264>camps.<s%>

And when they shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> with them, <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>assembly<s%> shall <S%H3259>assemble<s%> themselves to you <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> they <S%H8628>blow<s%> but with <S%H259>one<s%> trumpet, then the <S%H5387>princes,<s%> which are <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> shall <S%H3259>gather<s%> themselves to you.
When you <S%H8628>blow<s%> an <S%H8643>alarm,<s%> then the <S%H4264>camps<s%> that <S%H2583>lie<s%> on the <S%H6924>east<s%> parts shall <S%H5265>go<s%> <S%H5265>forward.<s%>

When you <S%H8628>blow<s%> an <S%H8643>alarm<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> time, then the <S%H4264>camps<s%> that <S%H2583>lie<s%> on the <S%H8486>south<s%> side shall take their <S%H5265>journey:<s%> they shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> an <S%H8643>alarm<s%> for their <S%H4550>journeys.<s%>
But when the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> is to be <S%H6950>gathered<s%> together, you shall <S%H8628>blow,<s%> but you shall not <S%H7321>sound<s%> an <S%H7321>alarm.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> with the <S%H2689>trumpets;<s%> and they shall be to you for an <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> you <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H4421>war<s%> in your <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H341>enemy<s%> that <S%H6887>oppresses<s%> you, then you shall <S%H7321>blow<s%> an <S%H7321>alarm<s%> with the <S%H2689>trumpets;<s%> and you shall be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and you shall be <S%H3467>saved<s%> from your <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

Also in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H8057>gladness,<s%> and in your <S%H4150>solemn<s%> days, and in the <S%H7218>beginnings<s%> of your <S%H2320>months,<s%> you shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> with the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offerings, and over the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of your <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings; that they may be to you for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass on the <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> day of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> that the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was <S%H5927>taken<s%> up from <S%H5921>off<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> took their <S%H4550>journeys<s%> out of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai;<s%> and the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H7931>rested<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6290>Paran.<s%>
And they <S%H7223>first<s%> took their <S%H5265>journey<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

In the <S%H7223>first<s%> place <S%H5265>went<s%> the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> according to their <S%H6635>armies:<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> his host was <S%H5177>Nahshon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5992>Amminadab.<s%>
And <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> was <S%H5417>Nethaneel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6686>Zuar.<s%>
And <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> was <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2497>Helon.<s%>

And the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> was <S%H3381>taken<s%> <S%H3381>down;<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1647>Gershon<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> <S%H5265>forward,<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

And the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> <S%H5265>forward<s%> according to their <S%H6635>armies:<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> his <S%H6635>host<s%> was <S%H468>Elizur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7707>Shedeur.<s%>
And <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> was <S%H8017>Shelumiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6701>Zurishaddai.<s%>
And <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> was <S%H460>Eliasaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1845>Deuel.<s%>

And the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> <S%H5265>forward,<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary:<s%> and the other did <S%H6965>set<s%> up the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H5704>against<s%> they <S%H935>came.<s%>

And the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> <S%H5265>forward<s%> according to their <S%H6635>armies:<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> his <S%H6635>host<s%> was <S%H476>Elishama<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud.<s%>
And <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> was <S%H1583>Gamaliel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6301>Pedahzur.<s%>
And <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> was <S%H27>Abidan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1441>Gideoni.<s%>

And the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> <S%H5265>forward,<s%> which was the rear <S%H622>guard<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4264>camps<s%> throughout their <S%H6635>hosts:<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> his <S%H6635>host<s%> was <S%H295>Ahiezer<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5993>Ammishaddai.<s%>
And <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> was <S%H6295>Pagiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5918>Ocran.<s%>
And <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> was <S%H299>Ahira<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5881>Enan.<s%>
<S%H428>Thus<s%> were the <S%H4550>journeys<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> according to their <S%H6635>armies,<s%> when they <S%H5265>set<s%> <S%H5265>forward.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2246>Hobab,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7467>Raguel<s%> the <S%H4084>Midianite,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses'<s%> <S%H2859>father<s%> in <S%H2859>law,<s%> We are <S%H5265>journeying<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it you: <S%H3212>come<s%> you with us, and we will do you <S%H2895>good:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, I will not <S%H3212>go;<s%> but I will <S%H3212>depart<s%> to my own <S%H776>land,<s%> and to my <S%H4138>kindred.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5800>Leave<s%> us not, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you; for as <S%H3588>much<s%> as you <S%H3045>know<s%> how we are to <S%H2583>encamp<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and you may be to us <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

And it shall be, <S%H3588>if<s%> you <S%H3212>go<s%> with us, yes, it shall be, that <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H2896>goodness<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H3190>do<s%> to us, the same will we <S%H3190>do<s%> to you.

And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days'<s%> <S%H1870>journey:<s%> and the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5265>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them in the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days'<s%> <S%H1870>journey,<s%> to <S%H8446>search<s%> out a <S%H4496>resting<s%> place for them.
And the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was on them by <S%H3119>day,<s%> when they <S%H5265>went<s%> out of the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> <S%H5265>forward,<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>Rise<s%> up, <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and let your <S%H341>enemies<s%> be <S%H6327>scattered;<s%> and let them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> you <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you.
And when it <S%H5117>rested,<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7725>Return,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to the <S%H7233>many<s%> <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
